question: 2018 财年，“股票薪酬”和“重组减值及其他退出成本”加起来（百万）是多少？
Tī 'net earnings including earnings attributable to redeemable and noncontrolling interests' siōng koân ê nî-tō͘, 'deferred income taxes' ê sîng-îm ū kúi-tang?

Nai lai chiah gi loh, ‘bōe-tit-chiah ê siu-ji̍t’ ê kái-piàn tùi 2017 kàu 2018, ya koh sī ‘chúi-chāi ê kang-chok uî-só͘ tit-tio̍h ê chioh-chîⁿ’ ê kái-piàn tùi 2016 kàu 2017, tī jīm-hô tōa-khó͘ ê hong-bīn, hâi-tōa-koân tō sī-nâi？
answer: ‘Bōe-tit-chiah ê siu-ji̍t’ ê kái-piàn tùi 2017 kàu 2018

question: Tiong-tâi 2016 chì 2018 nî ê 'pension kap pa̍t-ê khòaⁿ-lí kim-iàⁿ hū-lí kái-chè hū-chōa ê hū-chōa', chin-chiáⁿ ū tó-chúi-ê thâu-thiâⁿ ê chhiaⁿ? (chhiaⁿ-chiáⁿ chhut liáu sìⁿ-miâ ê sêng-chiòng)
answer: Tâi-á 'pension kap pa̍t-ê khòaⁿ-lí kim-iàⁿ hū-lí kái-chè hū-chōa ê hū-chōa' chhut liáu 3 tang ê liân-sòa kap chin-tiōng ê kàng-chē thâu-thiâⁿ. Hū-chōa tùi 2016 nî ê $118.1 pah-bān kàng kàu 2017 nî ê $35.7 pah-bān, chiū-án-ne 2018 nî koh tùi kàu $4.6 pah-bān.

question: Tī 2018 fiscal year, 'net earnings including earnings attributable to redeemable and noncontrollinginterests' chiàm 'net cash provided by operating activities' ê to-sò͘ kiám-sī thê-chènn-chiúⁿ? À kiám-sī chòe-liōng 1 ê sió-siòng ūi.
La̍k chhut 2017 nî ê chè-chè gî-bú iá-ū chi̍t-kóa chi̍t-kóa chi̍t-kóa chi̍t-kóa chi̍t-kóa chiat-chām, tān-sī tī 2018 nî chiah chiâⁿ-chòe tòe-chiah ê sòe-chām ê chè-chè lūi-hāng ūi-tī?
answer: pension and other postretirement benefit plan costs

question: Tshik-peh âⁿ-ê kó͘-sǹg nî, siáⁿ miâ kim-tiâⁿ tiâu-bo̍k chòe cheng-chha-choè, kap chiân nn̄g nî pí-kàu, iân-hôa cháiⁿ-iûⁿ sī kiâⁿ-chòe chiâⁿ-gōa ê.
answer: ' deferred income taxes' sī chòe tiōng-iàu ê chiâⁿ-gōa. Ân-tóe kim-tiâⁿ nî 2016 kap 2017, i sī $120.6M kap $183.9M ê lūi-sòe, tòe-liáu tī 2018 nî, i choán-ōe chòe -$504.3M ê hō-sòe. Chit ê chha-kè chha-put-to $700M tùi chìn chi̍t nî lâi kóng, tòe-ōe chòe hō-sòe, sī khah-chē kî-thaⁿ ê hong-miâ to̍h bē chhin-chhiūⁿ.

question: 2018 nî ê 'divestitures loss ( gain )' nā-sī kó͘-chiâⁿ ū $50.0 pah-bān ê lâi-lâi, chiū-kú-sī boán-choân bô sī téng-ê sò͘-jī, àn-choân chin-chē chi̍t-ê giâm-chặt sî, hit nî ê 'net cash provided by operating activities' ē sī siáⁿ-chē?
Tī nā-ê hòe-hūi-liân ê lia̍t-toaⁿ lāi-bīn, ū siáⁿ chi̍t-ê hòe-kim ê lūi-hō ê chu-liāu, sī tn̂g-tn̂g-á bô-sī sió-sió-á bô-sī hòe-kim ê siáⁿ-mih ê koan-liâm ê hāng-bo̍k?

Tui tioh chu-liâu só-tè ê chu-liâu, ē-sái lâi khoàiⁿ ē-sái khòaⁿ-kìⁿ "chheng-chháu-châi-sêng" kah "khai-chok oa̍t-tōng só-tè ê chhiⁿ-kim" tī sann-ê hō͘-chè nî chi kan ū siong-koan chò-hóe--bô? Kái-soeh lí ê lí-iû.
answer: Ū, ū-ê khoàiⁿ-tit-chhut ê chha-chhiat chhiat-siong-koan. Tùi 2016 kàu 2017, "chheng-chháu-châi-sêng" tùi $1736.8M kiám-chió kàu $1701.1M, koh chin hó-chhiūⁿ, "khai-chok oa̍t-tōng só-tè ê chhiⁿ-kim" iā tùi $2764.2M kiám-chió kàu $2415.2M. Tùi 2017 kàu 2018, "chheng-chháu-châi-sêng" tōa-tōa-tōa thiam-ka kàu $2163.0M, koh "chhiⁿ-kim" iā tōa-tōa-tōa thiⁿ kàu $2841.0M. Jīm-hô nn̄g-ê sî-chūn, nn̄g-ê sôaⁿ-miâ ti̍t ti̍t thiah chò-hóe, chin-chiok sī kóng kâi sî-chūn ê châi-sêng koh tōa, chhiⁿ-kim-châi-kim mā koh tōa.

question: In which year the company record minimum stock-based compensation?
